channel.title: Comments on: The Library is Now Open
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Thanks for pointing that out, Jeff. It is fixed now.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for pointing that out, Jeff. It is fixed now.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Cool... I'll have to check these out. I remember reading a few of them, but most of them are unfamiliar to me.
I think I found a wrong link: when I clicked on "Poem Shaped Lies" it brought up "From the Ashes of Puppets".
item.content:encoded:
Cool… I’ll have to check these out. I remember reading a few of them, but most of them are unfamiliar to me.

I think I found a wrong link: when I clicked on “Poem Shaped Lies” it brought up “From the Ashes of Puppets”.
